title: T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC 70 for sale

posts.post_title: T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC 70 for sale
posts.post_content:
Hello Net54 Members,
 I have a T206 Cobb Red Portrait SGC 70 (5.5) for sale or trade. It has a Sweet Caporal back. I'm looking for  Babe Ruth-Lou Gehrig cards of similar value to add to my personal collection or would sell outright.  I'm looking for well centered cards.  PSA or SGC is fine.  Please message me if interested.  References are available thru Ebay.  

 $2900 dlvd. 

Paypal, Check or Postal Money order works for me............ 
Check or Money order must clear before shipment.  
  

Thanks,
David Donofrio
Nice card David, hell of a first post
